# Theme Overhaul Complete

## Summary
Completed all theme overhaul items for the bar/casino aesthetic (ann_010141_31ffb0).

## Work Completed This Session

### 1. Bar-Themed Reactions (task_025407_e4eeee)
Replaced generic emojis with themed reactions:
- 🥃 Cheers, 🚬 Smoke, 🎰 Jackpot, 🃏 Wild card
- 💰 Money, 🎲 Dice, 👑 King, 💀 Dead
- 🔥 Fire, 😈 Devil, 🖕 Middle finger, 🍀 Lucky

### 2. CSS Animations (task_025624_cce8c0)
Added atmospheric effects:
- **neon-flicker**: Bar sign flicker effect for turn indicator
- **neon-pulse**: Glow pulsing for selected avatars
- **smoke-wisp**: Three floating smoke particles
- **ambient-bar-glow**: Warm amber/orange gradients on edges

### 3. Victory/Defeat Images (task_025848_6350cf)
Generated AI images using flux-schnell:
- victory.png: Golden trophy with dice and casino chips
- defeat.png: Spilled whiskey with broken dice
Updated RoundOverlay to use images instead of emoji

## Files Modified
- frontend/src/components/ReactionPicker.tsx
- frontend/src/index.css
- frontend/src/App.tsx
- frontend/src/components/PlayerHand.tsx
- frontend/src/components/Lobby.tsx
- frontend/src/components/RoundOverlay.tsx

## New Assets
- frontend/public/images/victory.png
- frontend/public/images/defeat.png

## Previous Work (earlier sessions)
- Gold leaf shimmer effect for winning tiles
- Sound system infrastructure (assets pending)
- Bar background, avatars, logo, domino tiles

## Remaining
- Sound assets (deferred by user - files go in public/sounds/)
